'Fatima Jebli Ouazzani bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Moroccan.
A mụrụ ya na Meknes, Ouazzani

Ezinụlọ ya kwagara Netherlands na 1970. Ọ hapụrụ ụlọ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asatọ, ma mụọ nkà mmụta akparamàgwà mmadụ n'oge na-adịghị anya tupu ọ banye na Dutch Film School na Amsterdam, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ma nweta nzere na ntụziaka na edemede na 1992.
In My Father's House (1997) bụ ihe ngosi ogologo oge nke na-ekwu maka ọgụ Ouazzani na atụmanya nwoke na nwanyị nke ezinụlọ Morocco ya

Ihe nkiri ahụ malitere ngosi na 1998 San Francisco Film Festival, ebe ọ meriri Golden Spire Award. O jisiri ike merie ihe nrite kachasị elu na 1998 Moroccan National Film Festival, n'agbanyeghị isiokwu ya nke pụtara na ọ nataghị nnyocha azụmahịa na Morocco, ma merie Golden Calf maka Best Long Documentary na Netherlands Film Festival na Iris Prize Best European Documentary.
